name: The M Agency
overview:
The M Agency is a consulting company focusing on digital-driven business transformation.

Practices : Digital Strategy, Social CRM, Performance Media, Brand Activation.

Clients : Orange, Carrefour, GBH, Digicel, Hersant Media, Nouvelles Antilles,…

Since is ignition in 2007, the company is focusing on being a local industry groundbreaker. Here is 5 power facts about The M Agency (TMA):

1 - TMA launched the first yearly study giving usage metrics on Internet in The French Caribbean Area : TWAG, twag.fr.

2 - Founder of TMA co-founded Outre-Mer Development, the premium business event in Paris, France, for french overseas business community.

3 - TMA creates and uses The Method, a standardized way of describing, benchmarking, optimising and improving business practices related to interactive opertations. It is the ITIL for webmarketing.

4 - TMA is sector-savvy for Online Travel, Retail and Public Sector, writing white papers, participating in industry conferences, giving courses at college, participating to industry-wide instances.

5 - TMA helps companies understand the opportunities induced by the local/global/multicultural world.
